channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This week with NSF Director Panchanathan

item.title: Researchers test ChatGPT, other AI models against real-world students
item.description: An experiment tested six generative large language models against students in an online introductory biomedical and health informatics course. The mod...

item.title: NSF awards $42.4M in new grants to support the future of semiconductors

item.title: How the brain changes during pregnancy
item.description: Researchers follow the dramatic changes that occur in the brain throughout the course of pregnancy.

item.title: NSF–DOE Rubin Observatory will reveal the faint light from sources of gravitational waves, neutrinos and more

item.title: Genomics reveals sled dogs' Siberian lineage
item.description: New research examines thousands of years of Arctic sled dog ancestry and reveals when and how Siberian and Alaskan sled dogs' DNA mixed.

item.title: Purple bacteria offer path to more sustainable plastic

item.title: Water temperature at Australia's Great Barrier Reef reaches hottest in 400 years

item.title: Early dark energy could resolve cosmology's two biggest puzzles
